Disaster relief from the U.S. Department of Agriculture could help farmers in upstate New York recover from property damage and livestock losses due to snow and ice build-up. The amount of heavy snow we've received this winter is unprecedented, Kirsten Gillibrand said. ''Federal assistance is absolutely critical to helping these hardworking farm families recover.''
